comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
Changed to
```adblock
[$path=/^\/$/]bbs.pcbeta.com#?##toptb ~ #wp > *:not(div):not(style):not(ul):not(script) + div[class][id]:has(div[style="display:none"])
```

please test this rule with

```adblock
bbs.pcbeta.com#@?##toptb ~ #wp > *:not(div):not(style):not(ul):not(script) + div[class][id]:has(div[style="display:none"])
bbs.pcbeta.com#@?##toptb ~ #wp > *:not(div):not(style):not(ul):not(script) + div[class][id]:-abp-has(div[style="display:none"])
```

comment.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью юзерскрипта [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard Browser Extension, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить для Chrome, Edge или других браузеров на базе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить для Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Yandex Browser

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://translate.yandex.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. При блокировке рекламы на сайте, блок рекламы исчезает, но структура сайта нарушается. Основные фреймы не по центру и аватарка сдвинута вправо.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Выглядит вот так:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010703](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704144-69c4a9ab-ea65-48ed-a119-c9ddef23af59.png)
</details>



<details><summary>Должно быть:</summary>

![Снимок экрана 2023-03-13 010733](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/52073031/224704300-f77151a4-20d2-4128-98b8-fd16d4df0297.png)
</details>





### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @Alex-302 По некоторым причинам я переустановил систему и браузер, соответственно, тоже. Проблема решилась сама собой. На сайте перестала показываться реклама.

issue.title: grabify.link privacy risk
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Y

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

G

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard French filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hello!
I found a link cutting service that collects too much personal information.

[Here is a screenshot with proofs.](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225961924-349dda2e-029f-4194-9d7a-a5d333986dfa.jpeg)

Here is the link to this service:

https://grabify.link

Here is some screenshots to prove their domains:
[Screenshot 1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963019-4264d896-be22-47a8-9d31-2a7e68ed57e8.jpeg)
[Screenshot 2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963026-dabc08bf-3fd0-4bfc-8aab-40d77bd0c661.jpeg)
[Screenshot 3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225963033-01cb514d-9518-4e20-9db6-73c6b95798fd.jpeg)


So I ask you to block all of the following domains, due to the fact that they are literally designed to covertly track users...


They track toooooo much information. This is the list of them:

```
Date/Time
IP Address
Country
City
Charging *
Battery*
Orientation
Connection Type *
Timezone *
Language *
Incognito/Private Window *
Ad Blocker *
Local IP *
Screen Size *
Browser
GPU*
Operating System
Bot Name
Referring URL
Device
User Agent
Host Name
Internet Service Provider
VPN/Proxy Detection
Tor Detection
Virtual Machine Detection

```

I believe that collecting such a huge amount of data about users can be used to further phishing or promote malicious spam mailings [(like these cases)](https://www.cnbc.com/2019/06/17/email-sextortion-scams-on-the-rise-says-fbi.html) . Please protect your users from such surveillance and block the operation of these domains.

Such a link can also get any extension [(screenshot here)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/128170075/225965058-4822c416-2f12-4743-803d-67d04c123b86.jpeg)
, which will allow embedding it into any email, tracking the recipient without his consent.

So I ask you to block following domains:

```
photovault.pics
bathtub.pics
foot.wiki
thisdomainislong.lol
gamergirl.pro
picshost.pics
pichost.pics
gamertag.shop
imghost.pics
imagehost.pics
toldyouso.lol
toldyouso.pics
screenshare.pics
myprivate.pics
noodshare.pics
cheapcinema.club
shhh.lol
dateing.club
shrekis.life -  
headshot.monster
gaming-at-my.best
progaming.monster
yourmy.monster
screenshot.best
gamingfun.me
catsnthing.com
catsnthings.fun
joinmy.site
fortnitechat.site
fortnight.space
stopify.co
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

### Внимание

Эта проблема решается с помощью расширения [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra).

Если вы используете AdGuard для Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включен в настройках программы.

Если вы используете браузерное расширение AdGuard, мы рекомендуем установить AdGuard Extra в дополнение к нему.

* [Установить в Chrome, Edge или другой браузер на основе Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установить в Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> 网站主页滚动图片包含gif格式广告， 请教，如何编写通用的拦截gif格式的拦截代码 例如拦截网站a、b、c的gif格式图片广告， 我会编写多网站适配一个拦截规则，只是不会精确的编写拦截gif图片规则，adg官网的教程太难，学的不够深，谢谢。
> 
> how to block site A,B,and C‘s gif format ？without killing jpg and png。

Hello @Lion-hk
For instance:
`/*.gif$domain=example.com|test.cn|dummy.net`
